import React from 'react' import Rating from '../components/rating' import {useSelector}from 'react-redux'; import {Link }from 'react-router-dom' import '../index.css' function Productscreen(){ const productDetails=useSelector(state=>state.productDetails); const{loading,error,product}=productDetails; return (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • PRICE:${product.price}
  • DESCRIPTION:{product.description}
  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock>0? (In stock) :(Unavailable)}
)} export default Productscreen;
